money | time | warranty ...

Money

How can I help you to save them?

I will make a responsive website that will work correctly on all devices based only on the desktop layout, which will reduce your costs for developing additional layouts for mobile devices.

Time

How can I help you to save time?

Writing a brief before starting work saves a lot of time, but even in a detailed technical specification it is impossible to take into account all the small details, so I think through the logic of each element on the site and offer the best option for solving the tasks.

Nerves

What can I do about it?

Suggestions, small edits and fixes that do not make significant changes to the structure of the site are included in the cost of the work. If you decide to change any minor details after the job has begun, this will be done at no additional cost.

Warranty

What can I promise to you?

Within two weeks after the finished project is handed over to the customer, edits and fixes will be made free of charge. But even if more than two weeks have passed, do not hesitate to contact me, we will definitely find a solution to the problem.

Technologies and Software

Techchnologies

HTML5, CSS3, JavaScript, Flexbox, Grid, Adaptive, BEM.

Software

Linux, Figma, NVIM.

Why would you choose me?

5 simple reasons:

  • Ready to start right away.
  • 99% is completed.
  • 95% of projects delivered on time or ahead of deadline.
  • Always in touch.
  • NO prepayment (depends on project).
Customer doubts

Your accounts are new. Why?

- I had been working as a front end developer in small companies for over 3 years, but now I offer my services as a freelancer.

How can I trust you?

- You don't have to. You can give me a test task and make a decision after you are convinced that I approach the matter responsibly and do my job well.

What is my expertise?

- Everything I know I learned on my own. To grasp a best practice I learned from mentors with more than 13 years experience. Since technology is constantly evolving, my training continues to this day.
